Movie & Dining: Flat ₹200 Discount on Swiggy Dineout (Minimum Order Value ₹2,000). Valid Twice Each Month
Rewards Rate: 5% Cashback Up to 1,000 CashPoints at Top Ten Online Merchants in India. 1% Cashback Up to 1,000 CashPoints on Other Eligible Spends
Reward Redemption: 1 Cash Point = ₹1 When Redeemed Against Credit Card Statement

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual Charges Waived on Spends of ₹1 Lakh or More
fees_charges.Rewards Redemption Fee: ₹50 + GST Per Cash Redemption Request. ₹99 + GST for Other Redemptions
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: A 1% Fuel surcharge is waived if you spend between Rs. 400 and Rs. 5,000 on fuel (Max Rs. 250 per statement cycle)
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the transaction amount, subject to a minimum fee of Rs. 500

product_details: 1,000 CashPoints as a welcome benefit on card setup (subject to realization of the joining fee).
Gift vouchers worth ₹1000 on spending ₹1 lakh or above in a quarter.
5% cashback at select partner online merchants, including popular e-commerce websites like Amazon and Flipkart.
1% cashback on all other spends except fuel, rental, and government spends.
Up to 20% discount on partner restaurants via Swiggy Dineout.
Renewal fee waiver on spending ₹1,00,000 in the previous year.
